title: CVStack
overview: A professional-grade resume and cover letter builder with pixel-perfect PDF output, 14+ templates, and real-time WYSIWYG preview. Runs standalone or embedded as an iframe module inside JobMint.
features: Full document editor — Profile, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects, Awards, Cover Letters
14+ professional templates — Classic, Modern, Technical, Executive layouts with LaTeX variants
Live PDF preview — real-time, high-fidelity Letter-sized preview with continuous scroll mode
LaTeX support — Monaco editor integration for direct LaTeX template editing and compilation
Deep formatting controls — typography, line heights, section spacing, margins, decorative elements
Undo/redo history — full edit history with Ctrl+Z / Ctrl+Y
Writing assistant — inline spell check, grammar analysis, and style suggestions via LanguageTool
Persistence — auto-save to localStorage, JSON import/export, DOCX import
10+ built-in themes with full dark mode support
Template gallery — browse, preview, and select templates with filtering and pagination
Pixel-perfect PDF export for print and digital use
Embeddable — runs standalone or as an iframe module within JobMint
challenges: Achieving pixel-perfect PDF output that matches the live preview across both a React renderer and a pdfLaTeX pipeline. Embedding the builder seamlessly inside a parent app (JobMint) via iframe with theme sync and document handoff via postMessage.
outcome: A production-grade tool live at cvstack.vercel.app with 14+ templates, full formatting controls, and a writing assistant. Used as a core module inside JobMint for job application resume management.
